174a2('bum): byed mchod par byed na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel log ke'u shi ka 'jig rten gi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gis yongs su bkang ba la zhog gi
174a3('bum): 'u shi ka gal tre rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir song gsum gi song chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams rin
174a4('bum): chen sna bdun les byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang
174a5('bum): byug pa dang / byem dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal/ mtshan dang / ba dan dang lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byas// bkur ster byas mchod par byam
174a6('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gso la pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde ba gshegs pa ma/ 
174a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / ma chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
174a8('bum): par byed pa dang / tshub bzhin tu yid la byed cing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / bye ma dang / nyon bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan dang / sil gnod

174b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi yongs su bkang ba lta zhig gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gi song chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag las sems can re res de ma

175a1('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim 'gror bgyis pa dang / bkur sIr bgyis pa dang / sI stang du bgyis pa dang mchod par bgyis pas ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang
175a2('bum): da lta byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ri mo re bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / snying stang du bgyis pa dang / mchod pa
175a3('bum): dgyis par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gra'i bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las/ sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yong su mya ngan

178a5('bum): bzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klags par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// dregs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bar bya'o// cangs
178a6('bum): ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul gzhin du yid la byas pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun
178a7('bum): gyi tshul rgyun mchad par mi 'gyur ro// grogs po dag dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
178a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnaMs dang / dbang po rnams rnam/ stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi
178b1('bum): ga rnams dang dgas pa'i mam sams rgyad bad / 'dugs pa'i badzin pa rnams bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad meng ba rnams dang mazugs med pa' stoms par 'jus
178b2('bum): rnams dang / rnam pa thar brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng pa dang / mangs
178b3('bum): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par spong rnaMs dang / sangs rgyas kyi
178b4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na
178b5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jig rten du 'byung bar/ 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po rgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rolang
178b6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di zung sheg/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub byaragyis shig/ kle'u shi kA khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chu la bzhin du yid la byos shig/ de ci'i byed zhe na/ ke'u shi ka lA ma yin las 'dri
178b7('bum): snyam du sems shing / sum cu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang thab mo bya'o/ sum cu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang mtshams bsal lo snyam na/ de'i tshe ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyi sems la kha ton gyis
178b8('bum): shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang des lha ma yin gi bsam pa de/ dag phyir nub rar 'gyur te/ sems skyed pa de dag zlos shing / rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i lung
179a1('bum): dang lha'i bu mo gang dag gi mdzes pa'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong na yang / ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton gis
179a2('bum): shig dang de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas lha'i gnas de nyid du skyes par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
179a3('bum): ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste da rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung se/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur
179a4('bum): ba de dag thams cad kyang / dga' ba'i rtsa ba des mthar kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog rna sa par ma tshang brgya par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na
179a5('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyanathos kyi dge' mdun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de
179a6('bum): dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slabs nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
179a7('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spabs shis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
179a8('bum): ba'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi
179b1('bum): la maHsa/ bla na med du stsa bya par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyam mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ dmyi phyir zhe na/ ke na ka de ni 'di la ste/ shes ra gyi tu
179b2('bum): dge' 'dun dang bcas pa ji skad cig gzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub ses
179b3('bum): dpe'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung sa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so// rgya byin kyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179b4('bum): 'di ni rigs sngags chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med po'i rig so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin/ 
179b5('bum): mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i rigs sngagaso// de ci'i sku da du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tra tu phyin pa ni mi dge' ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa'i/ gan/ 
179b6('bum): ba'i rlos thams cad bsgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
179b7('bum): 'di ni rigs sngags chen po'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rigs sngags// ka 'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnya
179b8('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'i rigs na de ci'i phyirare zhen/ ke'u shaM ka de rtsi ni 'di ltar 'das pa dang / ma byin pa dang / dkar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bcom pa yang / 
179b9('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs sngags 'di nyid la rten te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur to// mngon par rjod/ 
180a1('bum): par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par mtshang rgya bar 'gyuraro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs sngags 'di yod na/ dga' ba bcu'i las kyi 'jig rten yod
180a2('bum): ma na padang / rnye pa zhi dang/ 'dzug pa pa dmas pa dus pa da
180a3('bum): nyid thams cad dang / dran pa b.rang gzhag pa rnamapa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / chu 'phrul gdang ba rnams dang / dbang na pa dang / stongs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan la
180a4('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i sam yan lagargyang pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa snyoms par 'jug 'arnams dang / rnam pas
180a5('bum): ba'i stobs rnams dag mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / rtsa de bzhin nyid dang / mnor ba de bzhin stod dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / rnam kyi
180a6('bum): gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras du 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong bu'i 'bras bu
180a7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams
180b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ke'u shig byang chub sems dpa' yod na dag pa bdulus kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na spod pa nyid/ lab kyi rnam pa shes pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'a du
180b2('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'jig rten no yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dge bcom rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 
180b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'jig rten ma gdagos su yod pa yin no/ ke'u shi ka 'di lta sadaper na bzla ba'i dkyil mkhor yod na/ rtsi dang rgyu skar dang / skar/ 
180b4('bum): ma thams cad gdags su yod do// shAk+She shi ka de bzhin du byang chubs pa sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil mkhor yod na dga' ba'i spyod/ pa dang / yang dag po spyod pa dang / dge' ba cu'i las kyi lam dang
180b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
180b6('bum): yan lag dang / lam dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
180b7('bum): pa dgu dang rnam par thar pa'i ni song panyid dang / ma nam med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / baspobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
180b8('bum): dag so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ni thams cad gdags su yod do// slob pa dang mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas da kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma
181a1('bum): thams cad kyang gdags su yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas
181a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i chen yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o chos
181a3('bum): sten to// de ci'i phyir zhen byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs kyis kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
181a4('bum): chen po thabs la mkhas po gang dang / ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod/ 
181a5('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms para'ajug pa dang / rnam par thar pargyad dang / mthar kyis
181a6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / stobs cu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
181a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ban rgyu de la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mngon par mi byed pa dang / 
181a8('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs smin par byed pa dang / phun sum mtshogs pa yongasasu 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
181b1('bum): 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
181b2('bum): rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
181b3('bum): 'dzin pa dang / ma tshang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul gzhin du yod la byed pa de ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan gi yon tan 'di dag da / ya
181b4('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro// rgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom lda na 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / mtshang ba dang / klog
181b5('bum): ba dang / khye kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul gzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di la yon tan gang dang ldan pa 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs
181b6('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / mtshang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul gzhin du yid la byed pa de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par
181b7('bum): smin pa ma rtogs par dugs gis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mtshan kyi dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ mis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// nang rgya rtsa gcig
181b8('bum): gi bar gis dus byed par mi 'gyu ro// rgyal po bla nas gnod pa bya ba zhig byung ba lus/ gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di khwa ton du byed kyi cing / rgyal
182a1('bum): po'i pho brang du song ni/ des blugs tshol ba de dag skyes blugs mi rnyed de/ rgyal ba'i rgyu dang/ rgyal po'i bre po chen po drug kyang gtam 'dri ba dong tu blar
182a2('bum): shing dga' bar sems bur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi rdzing dang / mthus de ltar sems so// gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi thu/ 
182a3('bum): mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas/ nga rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po de dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam 'dre ba dang She t+yAmra
182a4('bum): bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byam
182a5('bum): pa'i sems nye bar gzhag pa dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / tang snyoms kyi sems bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'a
182a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul gzhin du yid la byed pa de ni
182a7('bum): 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyuraro// ke'u shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste nam yang dga' ba'i nu'i las kyi lam dang bram
182a8('bum): bsum gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
182b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / lasam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thar pa rjes dang / 
182b2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
182b3('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag bla rig pa rnams
182b4('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / bral rnam bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can rnams dang / yod/ shes su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gi lam ma rtog sapa
182b5('bum): nam yang sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i skye gnasu mi skye'o// de nam yang lag nyam sa pa can du mi 'gyur ro// nam yang dbul po'i ras
182b6('bum): mi smrasmyig ma 'khan gyi rigs sam/ spre sha can gi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag dar ba 'am/ shin du 'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/ rmangs rigs su
182b7('bum): mi skye ste rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing tshe skye
182b8('bum): ba'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang / bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
183a1('bum): rnams la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
183a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sems can rnams kyang yongasu smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed do// ke'u shi ka de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di
183a3('bum): dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung bar bya cang ba bya klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul gzhin du yid la byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
183a4('bum): nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bya'o// de dag ni nam bla na me da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'di yon tan dang / tshe rabs
183a5('bum): gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa s+ho/ nga phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu pa'o// 
183a6('bum): de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu bklags lta ba'i bsam pa can rgya tsam zhig/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas
183a7('bum): lha'i dbang po rgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ nga mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba rgyal po blags lta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong na de la bdag gis
183a8('bum): ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin parjod pas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong na/ bar chad byed par mi 'gyur rob de dag gis bcom ldan
183b1('bum): 'das las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gis bcom ldan 'das la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
183b2('bum): ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do// de nas mu segs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'ongs la g.yang phyogs su sbyor ba byas nas/ lam de nyid
183b3('bum): dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
183b4('bum): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang / sgo de nyid nas phyir dang de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dI bu sems kun tu rtog pa thugs su chud nas
183b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa sha ra dA/ ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol na tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas de'i phyir mu stegs can
183b6('bum): gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po nas/ nga le g.yang sa phyogs su skor ba bas te/ lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can
183b7('bum): gzhan dang / rtsa kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam yang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan
183b8('bum): ba glags lta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems can pa sha stag dang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang
184a1('bum): dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zhesdang bar sems sam/ glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro ba mthong ste
184a2('bum): de ni gnas med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang
184a3('bum): snyed cig yod pa dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung
184a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ shar dwa ti'i bu bzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga
184a5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge mduni dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
184a6('bum): dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / bri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam khA lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis
184a7('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yong su bzung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha sug go// lho dang nub dang byang dang / 
184a8('bum): byang sha ra dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byeng dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
184b1('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang banas pa ji skad cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin du bcas
184b2('bum): ba'i nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyin pa zhe na
184b3('bum): 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
184b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po dag kyang mngon par gyur/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / lha'i bu dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las/ 'dir ni gdon mi za'
184b5('bum): bar byang chun sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung / snyan pa 'gyur gyi de dag gis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
184b6('bum): ste/ bar chad bya'o snyam nas bdud sdig to can gyi sa dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas
184b7('bum): lha'i dbang po rgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te// kye ma bdud sdig tocan 'di dpung gi tshogs lhag bzhi mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la bdud ste// 
184b8('bum): to can gi dpung go tshogs yan lag bzhi rnams par bkod pa 'di ni rgyal po bim pi sa ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po rnam par bkod pa kyang de tsam mi phod/ rgyal po sde rab 'pham
185a1('bum): byed dang / shAg klu rnams dang / li tsa bI rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod de/ bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan
185a2('bum): 'das la klags lta zhing klags tshol sems can yang dag par brtson 'grus pa rnams la yang sems gtso ba'i bsam pa can bgyid/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag
185a3('bum): par bsam par bya'o// dran pa rjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam te/ dran pa gsal bar rjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po rgyu
185a4('bum): byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar rjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can de dog lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir ldog go// de nas 'khor de nyid na rgyal chen bzhi
185a5('bum): res kyi lha'i bu dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha ji snyed cig da'akhod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang na za' mang po mngon par sprul nas/ bar snang gi nam mkha' 'khod bzhi
185a6('bum): du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring po spyod par
185a7('bum): gyur da cig de 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhid gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nus pa/ 
185a8('bum): 'gyur la dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams/ phyogs cu'i
185b1('bum): 'jig rten gi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing dge mdun dkon
185b2('bum): mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur zhe'o// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am
185b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o// phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing / mun
185b4('bum): kha dang bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa lha'i dbang po rgya byin dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i da bu dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin
185b5('bum): to/ de de bzhin no// lha'i bu de dag de bzhin te/ ded bzhin no// dza srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du de banan mnan
185b6('bum): kha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong
185b7('bum): gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang phyogs bcu'i kun gyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub
185b8('bum): par mi 'gyu ri la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad
186a1('bum): bar du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs bam du
186a2('bum): byas te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so// phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar ngas shes so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang / 
186a3('bum): po mngon par sprul nasabacom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad kyi tshig rjod do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha ro
186a4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha glags tshol
186a5('bum): ba rnams kyi glags mi rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang sbyang bar brgyar
186a6('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing mchad pa dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi
186a7('bum): ba de ni ston pa 'am/ ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am
186a8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing ma tshang ba dang / klog tha cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa
186b1('bum): dang ldan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing ma tshang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin
186b2('bum): du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi bu bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing ma tshang ba dang / 
186b3('bum): klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom
186b4('bum): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di lta ste shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa mang nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ rnam pa
186b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan
186b6('bum): la da nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
186b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnyisu ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyi bar mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin to// de de bzhin no// kau ru she ka
186b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid
187a1('bum): g.yas byung ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhan k+She'u shi kAd ni 'di sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang bzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
187a2('bum): nyid kyang bzhin ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang banan la sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bzhan ma yin te/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
187a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid 'di la gnyi su med de gnyis byar medado/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u ti shu pa'o// de nas tsha
187a4('bum): zhan pa dga' bros yim ldan 'das la 'od skad ces gsol to// / bcom ldan 'das kyis tsam rigs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mang yong su rjod par mdzad 'di ltar sbyin par pha rol tu sbyin
187a5('bum): ming yang yongs su rjod pa 'du/ su ba ras tu na dag nga pa tu spyan 'grus pa sa tu phyin pa dang / 
187a6('bum): bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yangs rjod pa ma mdzad de/ de ltar nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pa nyid kyi bar gyi mang yang seng su rjod po ma mdzad do/ 
187a7('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su rjod par ma mdzad de/ de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / de rje 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang / bstobs rnams dang
187a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i yan lag rnams dang / de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad mod pa rnams dang / gtsug se med pa'i
187b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su rjod pa ma mdzad do// de ltar rnam pa thar pargyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang rta rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
187b2('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su rjod par mdzad do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
187b3('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su rjod par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo
187b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang
187b5('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stes pa nyid dang / 
187b6('bum): da pa smra paya sa man ga rna na ma lus kyi sa da
187b7('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tsA rgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o// mdun du 'dren pa'o// dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad
187b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma sngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu ma smos pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa'i pharo dang / brtson 'grus na/ 
188a1('bum): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su sngos pa
188a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su sngos pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags
188a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dga' bo gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// dga' bo gnyis su med
188a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngos pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188a5('bum): yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su spros pa'i sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ mi skye ba'i
188a6('bum): tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su spros pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang rta brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
188a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngos pa'i sbyin pa/ 
188a8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mi skye ba'i rdul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sus
188b1('bum): tshu ga khrims dang / bzod pa dang badzin 'grus dang lamam gtan dgags rab ni shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bgang stsal par gzugs gnan du
188b2('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'bugs dang / 'du byed dag / rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i nus dang / byang dub kyi bar du gnyis su me pa'i rdul zab de kar 'gyur ro// 
188b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ngosar gzugs gnyis su med bya tshul dang / de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang / nam padags pa gnyis su ma mchis pa dusal dang / re gang bya
188b4('bum): dadu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul lpags bcom ldan 'das kyis nga bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed dang / 
188b5('bum): rags pa ni rnam par shes pas stongs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa dang / rob tu phun
188b6('bum): 'di dag kyis su mang de gnyis su bur me ga pa byang chub kyi bar na byeng rlob kyis stong ngo // deci'i phyir zhen/ phyinani 'dis lung chub dang pha rol tu phyin ga dag gnyis su med de
188b7('bum): byar med do/ pa'abo de lta bson pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi thog mar 'gro ba ni gas rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa da do/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi phyogs su su / 
188b8('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam pa thar brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas
189a1('bum): ga pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pal gang / 
189a2('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres na rgyad dang / byang chub kyi bar gyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do// 
189a3('bum): dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la sa bon btab pa rgyu rkyen tshogs par gyur nas/ rnam par 'phel ba 'gyur ba yang sa chen po ni de dag gis gnas te sa chen po la rten cing sa bon de dag skye
189a4('bum): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten cing / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa gdum dang / 'phags
189a5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam pa thar brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas
189a6('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku dang / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo
189a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa na rgya dang rnam par 'phel lo// thas
189a8('bum): cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel te/ dga' bo rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnam par
189b1('bum): 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams par
189b2('bum): 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
189b3('bum): dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'phel/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
189b4('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa rgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
189b5('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzug sa kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nu dang / 
189b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nA rgyad rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing
189b7('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol
189b8('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dag yongasu grub pa'o// stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su grub pa'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongasu grub pa'o// yang dag par spong bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang
190a1('bum): dbang po lnga dang / bstobs lnga dag bya nub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'dugs pa'i lam yan labargyad pa yongs su grub pa'o / 'phags pa'i 'ded pa bzhi dang bsam gtan ban dang / tshad med pa
190a2('bum): dang / mazugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i dang / rnam pa thar pa rgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam khar thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spyod pa mang
190a3('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs cu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rjechen po dang / sangs
190a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nA rgyad yongasu sgrub pa'o// zas cad shes pa nyid dang / le gyi rna bar shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bsgrub pa'o// 
190a5('bum): bam po'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
190a6('bum): skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang mdag gis bcom ldan 'das las thos te
190a7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / nang pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang
190a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig bcom ldan 'das las bzung ste bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / kun nub par bgyid pa dang / spel ba de dag thams cad ni bka' sa
190b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / spel ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ dge bcu'i las kyi la rnam par 'jig rten du 'byung / 
190b2('bum): bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i
190b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
190b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ nang song ba ny-i 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid song pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar/ 
190b5('bum): bzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i la/ yan lag rgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs/ rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa co rgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro
190b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / brags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas/ rgyal rigs me ning mthong ba rnams 'jig rten du
190b7('bum): krung yi yu ro/ ma pa rdzos seM pa yang darnams na du gru sa bdag ga sa rnams shin tu chung sa gyur ro/ rgyal chen 'an ma
190b8('bum): rten na mchis so// 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / blags pa dang / nakun chub par bgyis pa dang
191a1('bum): tshal bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phy-ir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra com pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// rang
191a2('bum): sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams 'jig rten namachis so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang

191a6('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid bu dag kya tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ tshul khris
191a7('bum): kye phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 6kun chub pa byed pa dang / chus
191a8('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / lha rnam pa zas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par bral ba'i phung po dang / nang
191b1('bum): grol ba'i migs mthong ba'i du ba tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ke'u ga ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chug pa/

196a1('bum): nas cang po sgyu gyus mas tan pa dus rlab da da sa 'gyu byas pa s+ho ga spyo na sum
