254b1('bum): phun sum tshogs pa dri phun sum tshogs pa/ zhig yod kyang dug dang 'dres par gyur ro// kha dog dang / dri dang / ro yid du 'ong yin mod kyi sug sngal dang / 'on kyang dug can du zad na/ de la skyes bu byis pa / 
254b2('bum): ngang tshul can shes rab 'tshal ba'i rang bzhin can ni bza' bar sems te/ des de zos na/ kha dog dang / dri dang / r-i zhim par tsher mod kyi sdug sngal dang / sdug sngal gi rnam par smin pa 'gyur ro//

254b6('bum): bya'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims

254b8('bum): dag lamam gtan pa'i ses pa dang / tshang med pa lam dang / gzugs med pa'i rnams 'jug pa pani dang / mngon pa chags pa sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bum rkun 'dun rdzo

259a7('bum): nga'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang phra
259a8('bum): stong pa nyid dngamatshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dang / 
259b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dag ma mnyam pa'i chos nyid dag rtag tu bdang snyoms su gnas par 'dod ba'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chung ba ma yin
259b2('bum): don 'das pa yang ma yin ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul la ma/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis kyi yongs su sngo bar mi nus s+ho/ de ci'i phyir
259b3('bum): na/ de la rang bzhin med do gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni ngos po med pa sa/ dngas pa meng po ni dngos ming pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// zhes de tha zhes
259b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngo ba dug med pa yin te/ bdud rtsi'i mthar phyi nad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
259b5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngos na/ de ni log par yongs su bsngo ba yin gyi/ yang dag par yosu
259b6('bum): bsdu bar ma yin no// log par yongs su bsngo ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma yin te/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dasangs mi sngags
259b7('bum): pa'i yongs su bsngo ba des ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus
260a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dupa yong su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// rang gang ba nyid dang kyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang song
260a2('bum): nying dag dzam po med pa'i rib nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chu kyi phyogs kyi chos san rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bdo gnas dang / bas gtananas dang nang med pa rnaMs dang / gzugs med pa'i rnam par 'jug pa/ 
260a3('bum): dag na par thar brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i spros par 'jug pa dgu dag/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med par smon pa med pa dang / mngon pa gas pa dang / ting nge dzin dag gzungs kyi sgo dang / dri bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su
260a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa dang / so yod dag bla rig pa bzhi dag sas rgyas kyichos dam dres pa dud yo sa rdzog pa 'gyur ro// 
260a5('bum): bam po bcu bdun pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs/ su rdzogs par 'ami 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi
260a6('bum): brjod pa/ na nga gdas/ bas po med par dbang pa nyid kyi bar dag bya chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sus bcun gan / 'pharnam pa 'ded pa rnam pa dang/ bsapa mas
260b1('bum): rig pa bzhi dag/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba des ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par mi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ro/ 
260b2('bum): gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can nas yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par mtsha rgya bar
260b3('bum): mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
260b4('bum): 'di ltar yongs su brtag por byas ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsab de dag yongs su sngo bar bya ste/ de ltar yongs su sngos na/ 
260b5('bum): yongs su sngos pa'i rab tu 'gyur ro// zhes bya b.rathugs su chud pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang / cho sa nyid des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
260b6('bum): chub tu yongs subasngo bar bya'o// zhes yongs su rtag par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa/ rab 'byor da la/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
260b7('bum): legs so/ legs so// rab 'byorapa/ khyod de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi yongs su/ bsngo ba'i phung po/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
260b8('bum): dang / dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ba skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gags pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po
261a1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang / de bzhin pa nyid kyi tshul dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
261a2('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis ston pa ni/ rab 'byor nga khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum ge stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob par
261a3('bum): gyurd/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mdo dran par shes pa lnga thob par gyur pa na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sems can
261a4('bum): de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
261a5('bum): 'dre bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo bas/ yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ rab
261a6('bum): 'byor de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o// rtso'o zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes
261a7('bum): bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs
261a8('bum): par gyur da/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ma pa dang / dgra bcom par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can rgyun tu zhugs par gyur/ da pa dang / lan cig/ 
261b1('bum): phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom par gyur pa de dag sna thams cad/ nam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang / bso bsnyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen smanA dang / yo byad mang pos rim 'gror
261b2('bum): byos/ bkur stir byas/ sti sdang du byas/ mchod par byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phrol l+ya mya/ klas byam bcom ldan 'dra
261b3('bum): mdo/ bde bar gshegs pa mdo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor nga de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags tha myong mus su hA snro jo AHsuM ts+tsha hU~M
261b4('bum): bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o// rtse bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phulo zhes kyi
261b5('bum): mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya kye'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ sems
261b6('bum): can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur to// de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gos dang / gsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad du
261b7('bum): mang pos rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ snying stang du byas/ mchod par byas na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol
261b8('bum): ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa myed pa'i yongs su
262a1('bum): bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lo// rab tu 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am go rigs kyi bu mo do'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ rab ces bya'o// rtse bo zhes bya'o/ 
262a2('bum): dam pa zhes bya'o// phrul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// go ngan med pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems
262a3('bum): can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi/ khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed
262a4('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod pasnyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yod byang mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klu gi bye ma snyed du
262a5('bum): rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ sdi bsting du byas/ mchod ba byas te/ bde ba'i yod byang thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shor lho dang / lho nu
262a6('bum): nga / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs ro re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can rje srid cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
262a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bso bsgoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi skyon rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma steng du rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ sti stang du byas
262a8('bum): mchod par byas ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom
262b1('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ni chang ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang nga
262b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchis su lags na ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang gshong bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
262b3('bum): rab 'byor legs so legs so// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i/ tha ma
262b4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo
262b5('bum): ba de ni rab ces bya'o// rtse bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhe sa bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byord chags pa myed
262b6('bum): ba'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs
262b7('bum): rag cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / brgyar yang nye bar mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dge pa bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bsam gtan ba'i
262b8('bum): rang chad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i skams par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lha dang ston par gyur pa de dag ni migs pa'i 'dugs canano// dper sems can paman cang rgya du zhun
263a1('bum): par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag la gos dang / 
263a2('bum): bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ sti stang du byed/ mchod par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang dmigs
263a3('bum): pa'i 'du shes can no// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang 'grogs te/ thal mo sbyar nas dga' ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te
263a4('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das de da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas dmigasu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma
263a5('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul la bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mde dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
263a6('bum): zhing / ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba shin tu che'o// 
263a7('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum gi rims kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
263a8('bum): dag brgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rnams kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / 
263b1('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi phan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas
263b2('bum): pas/ dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo
263b3('bum): zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags pa lags ngag yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba shin tu che'o/ 
263b4('bum): de nas lha'i bu rab tshem dang / rab dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i bu dbang byed kyang lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang / de 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 'phro ba dang / spos dang
263b5('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / 
263b6('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dam de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas/ 'di skad kyi tshig rjod do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang
263b7('bum): rgyub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas mkhas pas dmigs su ma mchis tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dri
263b8('bum): skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsdu ning / cinas kyang mnyis su ma 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par mi 'gyur ba ltar yong su cwo ba de/ byang chub sems pa rje/ 
264a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin rje'o// de nas tshangs rims kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
264a2('bum): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu 'am na rigs kyi bu mo snga ma
264a3('bum): thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas/ dmigs pa'i sbyong ba can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis gnan pa ngo mtshar che'o// zhes sgrar bsgrags te na dbyangs su brjod do// tshangs lha nye ban dang / tshangs pa kun
264a4('bum): 'khor dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang kun snang dang / dge ba dang / rlung dge dang / tshad med dge bu dang / dge nga rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas rtsang ma'i ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig
264a5('bum): rgya stong du ma/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag btsal te/ bcom 'odas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
264a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pa de dag dang mi ldan pa dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gis mnam
264a7('bum): pa ngo mtshar che'o// zhes smrar bsgrags te dbyang su brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen ba ni'i ris gi lha rnams dang / gnas kyang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams la bka' sAlang ba/ lha'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi/ 
264a8('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur rang te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzos/ 
264b1('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung de ltar dag thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas de dag
264b2('bum): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
264b3('bum): 'am/ bas martan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ rdul khrims kyi phung po
264b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'am/ shes rab kyi phung po 'am/ rnam pa ngar grol ba'i phung po 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mang med pa gzhan yang dag kyang rung ste/ 
264b5('bum): de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas/ rjes su yid rang bar byas la/ de ltar rjes su yid rang nas kyang / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba
264b6('bum): bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs bya'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ des 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 
264b7('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa dag gis sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pharam
264b8('bum): chu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ khasam gautan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad ma po'i dbar de dag thams cad bkyin
265a1('bum): tu bsdus te/ dmigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / gnyis bu zang pa'i tshul dang / mtshan med pa'i chub dang / chags pa myed pa'i rdus dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul dug/ rjes su yid rang ba'i bar gyis rnas me
265a2('bum): rang bA dang / rjes su med rang ba'i gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / dul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam dang / mnyam pas rjesu yid rang ba nas/ rjes
265a3('bum): su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dmigs su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
265a4('bum): tu yongasu bsngo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu larigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas bsod nams ches mang du/ 'phel te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des
265a5('bum): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// myi
265a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ba byar// de nas tshe dang ldan byu ba'i byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas meng no// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
265a7('bum): dge pa rtse ba dag thams cing ma dang par bzus te/ gcig tu 'a sa ngas nang na ste/ rjes su 'a nga ba'i bar gyis rjes su med bdang / rjes sgra ya hUM bas marnas pa dang / sa pa bar gyis te/ 
265a8('bum): ming rang bar byed do// zhes bka' stsa lang san/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ rjes su yid rang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ tsa tsam gyis na rjes su yang rang ba'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byar du 'gyur ba/ 
265b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ka' stsal pa/ nam rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo do 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge mdun
265b2('bum): dang bcas pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi len mi 'dor ba dang / mi rlom myi 'dzum zhing dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin la de
265b3('bum): 'di snyam du 'di snyam chos gang yang skye ba med/ 'gag pa yang med de/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med de/ chos de dag la 'grib pa yang med/ 'phel ba yang
265b4('bum): med/ 'gro ba yang med/ phur bar 'gyur ba yang med do// zhes rnam da grangs de lta bus 'das pa dang / rnam byod pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid deng / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid da
265b5('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yid rang bar bya'o// rjes su yid rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
265b6('bum): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// zhes de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yid rang ba dam par 'gyur ro/ rjes su yid rang ba de dag dang ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
265b7('bum): bar du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rjes su yid rang ba de la ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yid rang ba thams cad kyis/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// rjes su yid rang ba 'di ni
265b8('bum): de ma yin pa'i rjes su yid rang ba bzhin dag pas rab ces bya'o// gtso'o zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na
266a1('bum): zang pa 'o/ ma mang pades rgyam ma sa pa ma sa sa 'o/ nga gzhin sang phyi nu sam dpa theg pa pa jogs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'das padag ma byo bdang dang byung/ 
266a2('bum): re bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gi/ sbyin pa
266a3('bum): rol tu phyin dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
266a4('bum): dang gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rjes suyid rang bar 'dod na/ 'di ltar rjes su yang rang bar bya'o// rnam par grol
266a5('bum): ji lta ba de lta bu ni gzugs so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams so/ rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni skye mched rnams dang / khas rnams so/ 
266a6('bum): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
266a7('bum): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam rtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab ras kyi pha rong tu phyin pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i jo bo nyid stong pa'i
266a8('bum): kye bar ro// rnam par grol ba ji lta pa de lta bu ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba dra wA du ni 'phags pa'i bangan pa rnams dang / bsam gtan nams dang / chang med pa rnams dang / gzugs mang
266b1('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
266b2('bum): par shes pa rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
266b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// rnam par grol ba ji lta bu de lta bu ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu rnam par grol ba'i ye
266b4('bum): shes mthong ba'i phung po'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni mos pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta bu ni rjes su rang ba'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta bu de lta bu ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung / 
266b5('bum): 'i chos rnams// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni/ sangasargyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta nye bu ni ka sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/ yongs su mya ngan
266b6('bum): las 'das pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams dang / rgan thos de dag gi yangs myo ngan las 'das pa'o// rnam par grol ba rdzis bu ni/ rang sangs rgyas
266b7('bum): rnams ngag sangs rgyas de dag gi sangs su mya ngan mas 'das pa'o// rnam pa gro b+ha dzig bu das bu ni sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag tshas nyid do// rnam par grol pa jis par shA dran tan kyis
266b8('bum): ma sa nga / ra la pa sa pa ma pa gyi su gyi da rjod 'dag mas dag pa kyi yangs
267a1('bum): ga ba dang rnam par byang ba myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos ma skyes pa dang / yongs su ma skyes pa dang / ma byung dra dag ma 'gags pa dang ma chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'pho ba med pa dang / 'jig bu med pas
267a2('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ rab 'byorang 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjes su yid rang ba'i b.rab bo// rjes su yid rang bar
267a3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar ro// rab 'byor nga rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
267a4('bum): rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'du dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / 
267a5('bum): skyong zhing chos ston pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs/ ste kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
267a6('bum): dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcwapa gang ji skad cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyam
267a7('bum): thos kyi dge mdun dang bcas pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzams theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ nam 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dag / bsnyun rmi/ 
267a8('bum): gyen ci dang / mi byad mang po dang / med pa'i mi byang thams cad kyis rim 'gror byas/ bkur sti'i byas sti steng du byas/ mchod par byas pa rang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as ra dag yongs mya ngarnams 'ang / 
267b1('bum): kyang de dag gi ring srel la nyin 'tshan du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang khrug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bda' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim 'gror bya'o// bkur stir bya ba dang / mchod
267b2('bum): bya ba'i don tu nyams su len cing / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims srung ba dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgom pa dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de dmigs pa'i tshul
267b3('bum): gyis bsam rten la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa gang / sbyin pa'i
267b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis paspyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind
267b5('bum): ba dang / shos rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa me migs pa'i tshul gyis s+hobyed pa'i tshe/ thabs ma bas bas dge ba'i rtsa pa de dag blan mang bas pa kyang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub mang su bsngon/ bsod nams po
267b6('bum): par 'du bya ba dang / dag pa mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la ni gsod nams mngon par 'du bya snga mas rgya'i tshur yang nyi mI 'gro ro// stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod de/ yongs su bsngo ba nyid rab nas/ 
267b7('bum): bya'o// gon med pa'i bar zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen pos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa ma/ 
267b8('bum): ril tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zin med pa mahAr/ 
268a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// / le'u nyi shu lnga pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus
268a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ 
268a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mos/

268a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba da thams nA byung ba'i slad du bde bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can thams cad kyi myig lnga yongasu thob par/ 
268a6('bum): bgyi ba la snang bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sems can shul log par zhugs par rnams mtha' las bsrog pa'i slang du shul ston pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
268a7('bum): ga chags kyi mtsham sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos skyed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
268a8('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi srad du/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi rtag mi 'jig
268b1('bum): pa'i slad du/ 'khor ba'i gnyen po'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos rin po che thams cad stong pa'i sla/ sems can 'gon ma mchis pa rnams kyi 'gon bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
268b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ thub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du stobs bcu skyed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gro ba dang / ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum 'khor ba'i chos kyi
268b3('bum): 'khor lo bskor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems theg
268b4('bum): pa ba 'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da ba/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu ston pa la ji lta/

268b6('bum): byed pa/ 'di ni byan pa mid te/ ston pa yang gzhanam yi do/ shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa ming ga'adas yin/ smin pa nyid kya nas ra kyi rkyen mol tu phyid pa/ shesarab kyi tsho tu byed do bathod par 'di

269a4('bum): 'dug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med rab dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzung dus kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu

269b3('bum): ste/ dper na/ dmus long brgya 'amaH stong ngam/ brgya 'am phrag stong yang rung ste/ dmigs su med par lam du 'jug par mi nus nas/ grong khyer du 'gro bar lta ga la nus/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni

269b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin/ par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mig dang ldan par gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung
269b6('bum): na pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob po// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dra'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ gang 'di skad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag/ shes rab kyi
269b7('bum): rol du phyin pas yongs su bzung na/ pha ros su pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob po/ zhes smras na/ btsun pa sha ra dwa'i bu de ni der yang ma zad de/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol
269b8('bum): tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo// pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung yang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo// smras pa/ 
270a1('bum): rtson 'grus dag bsam gtan kyi ba ma tu phyin pas so su zung bas/ pa rel tu phyin pa'i mi tha pa 'i 'gyur gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rom du phyin pas yong su bzung ba'i/ pha rab tu phyin pa lnga ni/ pa rab tu phyin pa'i ming 'i/ 
270a2('bum): ste/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

270a4('bum): po 'di dag ni rab ces bya'o// rtse bo dang / dam pa dang / mchog dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
