304b5('bum): rab 'byor da shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/ lam gyi rna bar shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ ci'i slad du/ bdag rnam pa
304b6('bum): dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ye shes thob pa dang zhig pa med pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
304b7('bum): chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa ni thob par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags
304b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du na gnyis su ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi ba ma lags/ 
305a1('bum): mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'odas kyis bka' bstsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
305a2('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal par rab 'byor shin tu rnam pa drug pa'i phyir/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun
305a3('bum): tu mtha' yas pas/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog mi dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
305a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun mtho' mas pa'i slad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
305a5('bum): rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol/ te pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// he tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / na du byed dang / rnam pa kun tu mtha' yas
305a6('bum): pa rnam par dag pa lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bga'o stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha mo med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun
305a7('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar tu kun mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
305a8('bum): ldan 'dus ci'i srad du bdag tu mtha' yas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pra Sha mtha' las 'das pa spong ba
305b1('bum): nga khyon ma rung ba ma med pa song pa nyid kyi phyirar/ gsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang de yang rtog d+ha ni/ byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin du// dus
305b2('bum): bka'o spel ba/ rab 'byor nga shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gang de ltar rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags
305b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi phyir/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen cha po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
305b4('bum): tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi 'gram 'am gnyis ka'i dbus na de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
305b5('bum): rab 'byord shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems/ me dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
305b6('bum): tshul rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi 'gram ma gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas shing shin tu rnam zer dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
305b7('bum): kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg bya ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la migs par mu
305b8('bum): dang sa 'du shes su bgyin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtsug tu 'byin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong bam// bcom ldan 'dus kyi skye bkau stsal pa rab 'byor de banyin de/ 
306a1('bum): galegs so logaso// rab 'byor de ni ming du mang chags pa yin/ mnan mar yang chags pa yin// gsol pa bcom ldan 'ongs ji lngar na ming du yang chags shing / mtshan mar yang / 
306a2('bum): chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka sA pa da ga/ rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du 'dzin tam
306a3('bum): mtshan mar 'dzin na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sog tu 'byin to// shes rab
306a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing / de shes rab kyi pha
306a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la mtshan mar bzung nas/ shes rab kyi pha nye rol tu phyin pas rlom sem su dang na/ de shes rab kyi pha ro// la tu phyin pas rlom semasu byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
306a6('bum): phyin pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' seMs
306a7('bum): dab chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de lta legs par bstan la/ chags pa dang / mi chags pa de dag kyang ma mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ni
306a8('bum): bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smos so// cha dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin/ ma chags pa ni gang yin/ 
306b1('bum): 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs myi mkhas pa gzugs stongs na zhes bya bar 'du shes ma chags pa
306b2('bum): 'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na
306b3('bum): chags pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
306b4('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos
306b5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa/ zhes par 'du shes na chags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang
306b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chu ba kyi yan ga dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa
306b7('bum): rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par
306b8('bum): thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
307a1('bum): gting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
307a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
307a3('bum): nga ba'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas 'odas pa'i chos rnams la 'das po'i chos so zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'o chos rnams la/ ma
307a4('bum): 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la/ da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
307a5('bum): 'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa'i tshul du/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
307a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
307a7('bum): hApA dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag
307a8('bum): ba rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyar/ 
307b1('bum): pA la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam
307b2('bum): mor thar pa dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la 'dod na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzin
307b3('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o// 
307b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
307b5('bum): rnams kyi chags pa med pa gang zhes zer ba ni/ tshe/ dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa/ 'a sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha
307b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs la gzugs shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba
307b7('bum): 'du shes pa med do// 'das pa'i chos rnams la/ 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la/ ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 
307b8('bum): lhar byung ba'i chos rnams la/ da ltar byung ba'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po zas mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha ro
308a1('bum): 'atsun pal spyod ste/ dag gis sbyin pa nigasbyin no// 'das sbyin pa ni sbyin/ byin pa zheg sbyin mo ma/ spangs kyis ni dru ga rgyams nis byung ngo // rmus sa
308a2('bum): 'di lta bu zhig slong / bdag gis ni bzad pa zhig bsgom ma/ bzong pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo/ zhe'am bdag gis brtson 'grus zhig brjod/ brtson 'grus 'di lta bu zhig bcom mo/ 
308a3('bum): zhe 'am bdag gis ni bsam gtan bani la mnyam par bzhag go// rabasam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go zha'am/ bdag gis ni zhes nab bsgom thong shes rab 'dzin
308a4('bum): bsgo tshun 'ag/ dag gis ni bsod nams zhig sarnyed/ gsong rnams 'di bu zhig byung ngo // bas mams 'di sa ga bskyed de/ 'am/ bdag gis ni/ 
308a5('bum): mas dpa' sems dpa'i skyon med par chung par byar/ zhe 'diskye bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing songasu dag par bya'o// na'am/ bdag gis ni sems can sangs su
308a6('bum): bya/ sa mA/ bduni gis ninam pa rnams pangs spyan pa tho bar bya sa d+hamamapa pa med / nga dzin pagar babyung nang mas pa 'phams pa dzir pa
308a7('bum): laso pa zhes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa 'i stod pa nirnam par rtog pa lta bu pos kyang da stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dade/ byinang stong pa tod dang/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyid dang / byin pa ga/ 
308a8('bum): ting dang / dod dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus kyis stong ba nyid dang / 'dus su byas stong pa nyid dang / mapa' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tham med pa nyid da/ dang ba med kyi nyid
308b1('bum): sa kyi senams kyi rmugs par 'a na du gyu kyis nga sa 'dzin kyi smra / dis
308b2('bum): sems dpa'i rig pa pa rigs kyi su / gas ma / 'dugs pa na sbyi pa'i pharo tu da par 'du ngag tshug khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brjod pa
308b3('bum): sa sa gyus skyer ba gyu sa kyi 'dugs pas da 'du sa
309a1('bum): dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thard pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
309a2('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so
309a3('bum): yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'du shes par gyur pa te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'dra
309a4('bum): shes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu gtul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong sa su bsngo zhing / yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa
309a5('bum): de dag ni/ ke'u shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi khu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste/ chagasapa de dag la chags par gyur na/ chags pa med pa'i shes
309a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsdu bar mi nus so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
309a7('bum): shes bya'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus ma snyomached dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myinus so// pha rol tu phyind pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs
309a8('bum): bar nga kyi sa kyi ngas su kyi rgyas kyi sa lam da kyi bdadams sa
309b1('bum): pa dang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa cha'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nus so// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
309b2('bum): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nuso/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
309b3('bum): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang ma dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nus/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras bu dang / lan cig phyir
309b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin bsngo bar mi nus so// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
309b5('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nus so// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhan zhigabla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i du yang
309b6('bum): dag par bstand tam/ yang dag par bskul tam/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam/ yang dag par dga' bar bya na/ yang dag par rjes su ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstand par bya'o// 
309b7('bum): yang byang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o// yas dga' ba bskyed par yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag
309b8('bum): ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod do/ zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod do/ bdag ni bzad bar pharol
310a1('bum): rol tu phyim pal gyur / bdag na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin du ma spyod do// bdag na pasam gtan gyi pha rolatu phyin pa la spyod/ bdag ni shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa sa spyod do// 
310a2('bum): bya bar rnam par rtog sa na mo mgyur ba dang / bdag ni stong pa nyid la spyod do// bdog ni phyi slong pa nyid la spyod do// bdag ni byinang song ba nyid la spyod do// bdag ni dngos po med pa'i rab nyid stong pa nyid kyi sbyong ngo / na
310a3('bum): ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cus bdun la spyod do// bdag 'phags pa'i bden pa nas la spyod do/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang / tshod med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
310a4('bum): bdag ni nas par thar pa rgyad dang/ mthar kyis gnas pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa dag dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshanam mo da ba dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam
310a5('bum): oM spyod do// bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnaMs dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyong na/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / 'jigs pa dang / so so ya dag par rig pa dang / sas
310a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres byas rgyad la spyod do// chos bya dz+rabar rtog par mi 'argyu dang/ na ni rnam thams cad masmyen du pa ni gi 'a sa spyod do/ zhes bya rnabar rin par mi 'gyur ba de ltar
310a7('bum): dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par skul bar bya/ yang dag par spro bskyod par bya/ yang dag par dga' ba skyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyong pa'i rigs kyi tshul/ rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na med pa yang
310a8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ta yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par sprul bar bya'o// yang dag par bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba skyed par bya'o// yang dag par snyan pa dang / yang dag par
310b1('bum): bar bya ba de dang yang dag par spro ba skyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba skyed par bya ba'i des gzhan la yang dag par ston cing / yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba skyed cing yang dag par
310b2('bum): dga' ba byed pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang rmo byung ba mi 'gyur de/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par skul bas yang dag pa skal ba yin te// de ltar na rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thos
310b3('bum): cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la lag so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byorang de ltar khyod byang chub seMs dpal la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag
310b4('bum): so pa legs so// legs// rab 'byor da de sa shes na/ khyod la tshogs pa'i rnab de bas kyang / phra ba bstan par byas/ de bzhin du legs par nyon la yid la zu shig dang / bstam par bya
310b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o// zhes nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga brtsa ma ldan 'das la phyir nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'disnyed ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byorang rigs kyi bu
310b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar byed na/ rab 'ab 'byor
310b7('bum): mi tsam du mtshan mar gyur bya de tsam du chags pa'o// gang yang 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang nga ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byangs rgyas chags pa thas cad dang bral ba
310b8('bum): re rag ris thugs dang po srid bya nas spyod de pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar ga dge ba'im pa gang ji snyed pa de dag zas cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing yid la khrus te/ tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mam
311a1('bum): sngon/ rab 'byor de ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang / de ma yin pa'i sos tsa ni gzhan nas kyis dge ba'i
311a2('bum): gang rje snang pa de dge thas cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/ tha med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu so na/ rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa pa de tsam du chags pa'o// dam la' byor zhen
311a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid yid la bya ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
311a4('bum): tu phyin pa ni zab po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rna bar dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
311a5('bum): pa la phyag ma tsha'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin te/ ba ma byas/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon
311a6('bum): par mtshang rgya bar mi nus so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thos cad mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis
311a7('bum): ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byorang chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no// gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par
311a8('bum): 'du ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos kyi rang bzhin rtsig po rang bzhin ma byas pa mngon 'du ma byas pa shes na chags pa'i rna ba thas cad yongasu spangs pa yin no/ 
311b1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni rtogs par dka'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong
311b2('bum): ma rtogs pa rnam par ma shes rna bar sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
311b3('bum): rab 'byo rang de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so// gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa ma shes so// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
311b4('bum): 'byung bas ma shes so/ pha rol tu phyin pa rjes dang / stong pa nyid rjes dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bas gtan dang / tshad med pa dang
311b5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par rgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa da
311b6('bum): mngon par shes pa nas kyis ma shes so// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma sheso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
311b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres paco rgyad kyis ma shes so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub kyis mashes so// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid
311b8('bum): rno ma zas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu bya'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
312a1('bum): rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyi ba ma mchis pa'o// bum ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir
312a2('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
312a3('bum): 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi phal tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
312a4('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes
312a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad pa
312a6('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gartan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mi spyod nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa/ 
312a7('bum): brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ gal te ting nge 'dzin dang
312a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs cu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rmi
312b1('bum): mi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dza
312b2('bum): gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba le/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa ces bya ba 'i/ mi rtag ces bya ba/ 
312b3('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'i/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// galate gzugs
312b4('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi
312b5('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam pa zas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bde zhes bya ba'i/ sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
312b6('bum): byon pa la spyod do/ gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ gal te rjer ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'i
312b7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bdag ces bya ba la bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rog tu phyin pa la spyod du/
